attributes.action: Give out free sweets on Fridays!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that giving free sweets to the general public on Fridays would increase their working concentration and enjoyment in the workplace. Spirits would be lifted and everyone would be generally happier, causing them to work more enjoyably and perform better. This would, in turn, improve productivity and performance, resulting in an increased level of economic activity in the UK and hastening the end of the credit crunch. Ta-dah!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
